    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:S809_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>S809_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Imaging in medicine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Belichtung in der Medizin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation image dans la médecine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagem latente na medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione immagine nella medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση στην ιατρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyección de imagen en medicina</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">X-rays, CT scans and MRI scans are all medical imaging techniques of great practical importance that have been encountered by a great many people in their medical histories. This unit illustrates how these techniques work – and their limitations and advantages.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Computed_tomography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">diagnosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Magnetic_resonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">medical_imaging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Medicine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">MRI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">NMR</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Radioactivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Radionucleotide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Safety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Ultrasound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">X-ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Röntgenstrahlen, CT sucht ab und MRI Scans sind 
alle medizinische Belichtung Techniken des großen praktischen Wertes,
die durch ein großes viele Leute in ihren medizinischen Geschichten 
angetroffen worden sind. Diese Maßeinheit veranschaulicht, wie 
diese Techniken arbeiten? und ihre Beschränkungen und Vorteile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les rayons X, CT balaye et les balayages sont tous
de MRI des techniques médicales de formation image de grande 
importance pratique qui ont été produites par un grand beaucoup de 
gens dans leurs antécédents medicaux. Cette unité illustre 
comment ces techniques fonctionnent ? et leurs limitations et 
avantages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os raios X, CT fazem a varredura e as varreduras 
são tudo de MRI as técnicas médicas da imagem latente da 
importância prática grande que foram encontradas por um grande 
muitos povos em seus histories médicos. Esta unidade ilustra 
como estas técnicas trabalham? e suas limitações e vantagens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I raggi X, CT esplorano e le esplorazioni sono 
tutte di MRI tecniche mediche di formazione immagine di importanza 
pratica grande che sono state incontrate da un grande molta gente 
nelle loro anamnesi. Questa unità illustra come queste tecniche
funzionano? e le loro limitazioni e vantaggi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ακτίνες X, οι ανιχνεύσεις CT και MRI οι 
ανιχνεύσεις είναι όλες ιατρικές τεχνικές απεικόνισης μεγάλης 
πρακτικής σπουδαιότητας που έχουν αντιμετωπιστεί από πολλούς 
ανθρώπους στα ιατρικά ιστορικά τους. Αυτή η μονάδα 
επεξηγεί πώς αυτές οι τεχνικές λειτουργούν; και οι 
περιορισμοί και τα πλεονεκτήματά τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las radiografías, CT exploran y las exploraciones
son todas de MRI las técnicas médicas de la proyección de imagen de
la gran importancia práctica que han sido encontradas por un grande 
mucha gente en sus historiales médicos. ¿Esta unidad ilustra 
cómo estas técnicas trabajan? y sus limitaciones y ventajas.</string>
          </description>
